forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of patchy fog early. Mostly cloudy skies. High around 15C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of patchy fog early. Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 53F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. High 56F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 54F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain, heavy at times early. High 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain, heavy at times early. High near 55F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. E winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. E winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 6C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 39F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High around 10C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 49F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High around 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 49F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low around 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
